trait.name: Sneak Attack (Spy)
entries: The junior intern deals an extra 4 ({@damage 1d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the junior intern that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the junior intern doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Junior intern makes 2 dagger attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) damage in melee, or 4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) damage at range.

Junior Interns are individuals that have proven themselves usefull to the library, however will frequently require additional training. Rarely will they be allowed to take on significant missions without oversight or aid.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The senior intern deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the senior intern that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the senior intern doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Senior intern makes 2 dagger attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage in melee, or 5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) damage at range.
Senior Interns are proven individuals allowed to frequently take missions on by themselves, but can typically only work within a specific region.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The senior intern deals an extra 11 ({@damage 3d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the senior intern that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the senior intern doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of its turns, the Junior Associate can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage or Hide action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Senior intern makes 2 dagger attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage in melee, or 5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage at range.

Junior Associates are allowed to travel freely and take on missions within any branch of the library. Occasionally Junior Associates will run book stores but when doing so they always have supervision.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The senior intern deals an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the senior intern that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the senior intern doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of its turns, the Junior Associate can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage or Hide action.

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, the Senior Associate has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the Senior Associate scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Senior Associate makes 3 dagger attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage in melee, or 6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage at range, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.
Senior Associates are allowed significant freedom within the organization and gain the privilege of recruiting junior interns and running book stores.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The archmage is an 14th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). The archmage can cast {@spell disguise self} and {@spell invisibility} at will and has the following wizard spells prepared:
footerEntries: *Rolf casts these spells on himself before combat.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Rolf has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.
Rolf is a human male in his early thirties working at the Arcanist's Academy
